name: arrayPrepend
description:
Inserts an array element at the beginning of an array
 and shifts the positions of the existing elements to
 make room.

examples.title: Prepend a value to an array
examples.description: Uses the arrayPrepend function to prepend a value to the beginning of an array and shifts the positions of the existing elements.

examples.title: Prepend a value to an array using the Array member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Invoking the the prepend function on an array is the same as running arrayPrepend.
